title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
OB: The context menu does not display the Team entry when trying to sync a .java file and another resource.
EB: The context menu should display the Team entry when trying to sync a .java file and another resource.
SR:
1. Open the context menu for the .java file and another resource.
2. Check if the Team entry is present in the context menu.
